title: How long does it take to be able to gift a friend
body: How long does it take to be able to gift a friend on LoL because he wants to gift me  but says you havent been friends long enough. :)

replies.body:
That is actually incorrect, it actually takes a full 2 weeks (14 days) before you can gift someone on your Friends List.  If they are removed for any reason, then you will need to wait an additional 14 days before you are able to gift.

I hope that clarifies a bit!
Whoops, mistyped that. :p Thanks for clarifying.
